proj.label: 6 Cherry Hills Lane
proj.title: Cherry Hills is Calling
proj.fourFeatures: Luxury Gated Community,Top Luxury Accomodations,Single Family Luxury Living,3+
proj.description: Enjoy the tranquil setting of this spectacular French style home located on a cul-de-sac and situated on the 7th hole of Newport Beach prestigious Big Canyon Country Club. Quality finishes and craftsmanship abound in this beautiful custom home. Amenities include 5 bedroom (master downstairs), 5.5 baths, sauna, elevator, outdoor barbeque and putting green.

proj.label: 6 Sandy Cove
proj.title: Majestic Luminocity
proj.fourFeatures: Views & More Views,Pristine Pool & Private Spa,Beautiful Vistas Abundant,Carefully Positioned Stonework
proj.description: Casual elegance and resort living abound in this beautifully upgraded $$$ Crystal Cove home. This 4 or 5 bedroom home features Travertine flooring, dark wood cabinetry, plantation shutters, custom wood built-ins, Library/office,crown moldings,lush landscaping and extensive hardscape. Largest Seabourn floorplan over 4,000 SQ.FT. Entertainers delight with pool, spa, waterfall and BBQ. Four houses from beach access to Crystal Cove beach and walking trails.
